Package fr.istic.aco.editor.kernel

Class UndoManager

java.lang.Object
fr.istic.aco.editor.kernel.UndoManager
public class UndoManager extends Object
This class manages the undo, redo, and store operations for the editor. It uses stacks to keep track of past and future states and commands.

    Method
    Description

    backToPreviousState()
    Restores the editor to the previous state.

    Clears the future states and commands.
    private void
    moveNearestFutureToPastOrNot()

    Redoes the last undo operation.

    private void
    storeSnapshotOrNot()
    Stores a snapshot of the editor if the number of commands is a multiple of k.
    void
    undo()
    This method is used to undo the last operation It will restore the previous state of the editor and use k to apply the last k commands, and then that state becomes the current state we then adjust the past and future states and commands accordingly

    • undo

      public void undo()
      This method is used to undo the last operation It will restore the previous state of the editor and use k to apply the last k commands, and then that state becomes the current state we then adjust the past and future states and commands accordingly
